item.title: Russia and Ukraine fail again to agree ceasefire but commit to prisoner swap
item.description: The two warring sides remain far apart on how to end the conflict after a second round of talks in Turkey.

item.title: Macron waxwork stolen from French museum by activists
item.description: The activists hid the waxwork under a blanket before taking it out through an emergency exit, reports say.

item.title: Bill Gates to give most of his $200bn fortune to Africa
item.description: The Microsoft founder urges young innovators to use Artificial Intelligence to improve health services.

item.title: UK backs Morocco's plan for disputed Western Sahara
item.description: As part of the deal, the UK will secure lucrative investment projects in the 2030 World Cup.

item.title: Al-Qaeda linked group says it carried out huge attack on Mali's army
item.description: The army says it defended its post "vigorously" but eventually withdrew, as militants seized on their base.
